summary: Marco Rubio Coin - Marco Rubio is the ONLY clear choice for Vice President. All of the other hopefuls lack the absolute killer instinct that only Marco Rubio possesses. Rubio ran against Trump in the 2016 presidential election and proved his worth as a vicious attack dog capable of withstanding the GOAT’s scathing insults and holding his own in some of the most impressive verbal jousting the world has ever seen. While he did not win, he cemented his reputation as the #1 contender, and that makes him THE obvious choice for Vice President!
